title: ML Model Integration
prompt:
Integrate ML model into [APPLICATION]:

Model Details:
- Type: [Classification/Regression/NLP/Vision]
- Framework: [TensorFlow/PyTorch]

Requirements:
1. Model serving infrastructure
2. API design for inference
3. Preprocessing pipeline
4. Postprocessing and formatting
5. Performance optimization
6. Monitoring and drift detection
7. Error handling and fallbacks
8. Scalability (load balancing, GPU)
9. Security
10. Documentation

Provide complete integration code and deployment guide.
example: Integrate sentiment analysis into feedback system
